title: Masteries won't save but its still there.
body: OK so while i was doing my masteries I came across and error and thought it was no big deal. All of it was still there and saved but when I pop into game I don't have a keystone. I thought that's weird. We lost that game so I went into another one, same thing happened. I thought my Keystone was messed up but i went onto lolnexus.com and found out my masteries wasn't their and it said 0/0/0. So i thought this was a bug until i go back the the home screen and try to look at my masteries.... still there. So my problem is why isn't my masteries taking action in game but it shows it at home or in champ select?

replies.body:
It sounds like one or more of your mastery pages are corrupt. I recommend deleting them all, restarting your client, then creating them from scratch to see if it clears the corruption.

Let me know if that helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7mMMJ9Ye,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-04T23:29:36.056+0000)
>
> It sounds like one or more of your mastery pages are corrupt. I recommend deleting them all, restarting your client, then creating them from scratch to see if it clears the corruption.
> 
> Let me know if that helped.

This works. I tried deleting them all and it ended up helping.
